QueryDefinition.Query:
SELECT distinct a.adm_phy, max(a.prov_id) as care_site_id, max(a.admphy_spec) as provider_source_value, max(b.phy_spec_desc) as speciality_source_value FROM {sc}.pat a join {sc}.physpec b on a.admphy_spec = b.phy_spec group by a.adm_phy union
SELECT distinct a.proc_phy, 57824101 as care_site_id, a.procphy_spec as provider_source_value, b.phy_spec_desc as speciality_source_value FROM {sc}.paticd_proc a join {sc}.physpec b on a.procphy_spec = b.phy_spec
